transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji, idhar Manikanth anna, aapko baat kar rahe the IndiaMART company se.
Customer: Ji sir, aapka subah call aaya tha na miss ho gaya jispe maine call kiya.
Executive: Jo Hello. Inhone na call nahi kari, maine na nahi kari, lage hai galti se lage hai, isliye maine call nahi kari.
Executive: Achha. Aapne nahi kari, ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Achha, theek hai, bas feedback hi le leta hu, phir aapke abhi IndiaMART ki services kaise chal rahi hai? Business kaisa aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Business theek thak to nahi aa raha, baki mujhe pata bhi nahi hai jyada. Madam ko number hai, dusra number hai hamara usme usko kar lo call. Achha, wo handle karte hai.
Customer: Haan, abhi maine call kara tha, 2:00 baje se baat karna, abhi wo exam dene gayi hai.
Executive: Achha, 2:00 baje ke baad, mai unko 4:00 baje karu to sahi time rahega?
Customer: Haan, haan, bilkul sahi hai.
Executive: 4:00 baje kar leta hu, kyuki business nahi aa raha to ispe kaam ka kaam turant ho jayega. Unse mai discuss kar leta hu. Aate hai, do-do, char-char, do-do, char-char piece wale aate hai, aise theek nahi hai.
Executive: Achha, ek itna minimum aap mujhe thodi mai ek baar issue likh lu, write down kar leta hu, taki jab mai unhe call karu na, ek baar mai bhi yaha backend se dekh lu kya-kya reason hai, taki hum isko aaj hi resolve kar paye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ek baar mujhe aap bata sakte hai, mai points aapse puchta jaunga, unke bare me mujhe thoda bata dena ki kaise-kaise aa raha hai. Pehle mujhe mujhe mujhe kya hai na mai IndiaMART dekhata nahi hu, mujhe bilkul bhi idea nahi hai uska.
Executive: Achha, bilkul idea nahi hai. Achha, phir wo general way me puch leta hu ki jaise koi leads aati hai na ya call aati hai, uska flow kaisa hai? Ki matlab aise din ki 20 aati hai ya din ki ek-do aati hai ya 10 aati hai?
Customer: Abhi to maine aapko bataya, mujhe pata hi nahi hai jab.
Executive: Achha, theek hai, pata nahi hai.
Customer: Maine dekha nahi na, mujhe kya pata.
Executive: Achha-achha, nahi abhi aap wo quality ka kehte hai na, quality sahi nahi isliye mai call ka puch raha tha. Kuch idea ki calls ka kuch ki kharabi aa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Quality kharabi nahi hai, matlab hamare paas jo lead aati hai wo koi retail wale mangte hai, aise nahi aate, bulk me nahi aate.
Executive: Achha, retail wale maximum aa rahe hai. Theek hai, mai isko note down kar leta hu, retail ka issue hai.
Customer: Retail ka hai.
Customer: Char-char, chhe-chhe piece wale aate hai, koi char piece mangta hai, koi chhe piece mangta hai. Ab hum koi dukan thodi na leke baithe hai factory hai.
Executive: Char-chhe piece, correct hai bilkul, wo to fayda nahi hai na, phir upar se delivery ka bhi charge.
Customer: Hmm, wo to fayda nahi hai isme. Kyuki aur aap mujhe bata sakte hai aap jo mainly business karte hai usme jo top categories hai, mai ek baar pata kar leta hu. Aap jo main jo aapki top category hai jisme aap maximum deal karte hai wo yahi hai, solar street light pole aur ye street light pole?
Customer: Haan, decorative light pole.
Executive: Inme se matlab jo sabse upar aapke top preference rakhte hai apni category ko kaunsi hai jisme aap sabse jyada deal karte hai ya chahte hai ki sabse jyada mujhe yaha se mile?
Customer: Decorative pole, decorative pole.
Executive: Decorative pole.
Customer: Haan, haan, uska flow kam hai, ek mai isko bhi note down kar leta hu, decorative flow light.
Executive: Okay, isme aap chahte hai flow badhe.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Decorative pole banta hai, main hamara decorative polo ka kaam hai.
Executive: Achha, aur ye decorative ek to ye ho gaya decorative light lighting pole aur ek alag se category hai decorative light. Ye dono ka hi hai na same?
Customer: Haan, dono same.
Executive: Isko ek minute, ye dono category me aap theek hai. Aur mujhe ek baar ye bata dijiye ki jo ye wali category hai solar street light pole, ye aapki matlab top preference me aati hai ya second preference me aati hai?
Customer: Isko agar business ke term me puchu to. Isko isko isko aap second pe rakho, top me designer pole rakh do.
Executive: Second pe, okay, sabse upar, sabse upar rakhna hai decorative. Theek hai, isko second pe rakhna hai.
Customer: Hello. Decorative pole rakh do sabse upar.
Executive: Haan, uske baad kaunsa designer?
Customer: Theek hai na sir abhi. Haan, ek hi baat hai, designer pole ya decorative pole baat to ek hi hai.
Executive: Haan-haan. Achha, ye aapne mujhe kaafi achhi information de di, isse kya hoga na mai directly unse ispe discuss kar paunga. Kyuki actually kya ho raha hai na jo wo lead jaha pe use kar rahi hai na wo aapne dekha hoga solar street light ki jyada aa rahi hogi. Kyuki iska congestion kaafi jyada hai.
Executive: Isliye taki mai unhe directly suggest bhi kar paunga. Ye aapne kaafi achha point bata diya hai kyuki direct ye ho jata hai na aap kis me deal kar rahe hai direct wo easy pad jata hai. Theek hai, isko second me rakh deta hu mai solar ko. Ek mujhe third, mai do-teen aur puch leta hu kyuki top me na aa rahi hai, inme se mujhe batana ki kaunsi aapki top me nahi hai. Theek hai, jo aap matlab less deal karte hai. Ek to aa jata hai street light pole, wo to same ho gaya.
Executive: Lightning pole.
Executive: Garden pole light, LED bollard light.
Executive: Inme se koi aapki aisi category hai jisko aap top me chahte ho?
Customer: Haan, garden lighton ko top me chahte hai.
Executive: Garden.
Executive: Ek minute isko likh deta hu, theek hai garden. Ek baar mai wapis repeat kar deta hu, ab jo bach gaye garden ke alawa, street light bach gayi, lightning bach gayi aur LED bollard light, ye do bach, teen bach gayi hai.
Customer: Garden bhi dal lo.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ye bhi hai, LED.
Executive: Theek hai, maine list bana li, theek hai mai unko 4:00 baje connect karta hu, inpe mai work kara, work ke liye baat karta hu. Hum as a team kaam karte hai unke sath, ye business aapko milega isme improvement hogi. Theek hai sir? Theek hai. Okay sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Business is not doing well.

- Leads are mostly for retail quantities.

- Wants more leads for decorative poles.



Resolution:

- Executive noted the issues.

- Executive gathered information about top product categories.

- Executive noted preferred order of product categories.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with concerned team at 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, retail, decorative pole
